name: AnimalEntityHelper
description: The AnimalEntityHelper class provides specialized access to animal entities in Minecraft, offering methods for breeding mechanics, food preferences, and animal compatibility checking.
overview: This class serves as the base class for all passive animal helpers and extends MobEntityHelper, inheriting comprehensive functionality for mob behaviors, living entity properties, and basic entity operations. This helper is essential for scripts that manage animal breeding, farm automation, animal feeding systems, or any functionality that requires interaction with Minecraft's animal ecosystem.

methods.name: isFood
methods.description: Checks if a given item or item stack is a valid breeding food for this animal, respecting its specific dietary preferences.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item or item stack to check for food compatibility.

methods.name: canBreedWith
methods.description: Checks if this animal entity is compatible for breeding with another AnimalEntityHelper instance, respecting Minecraft's internal breeding logic including species compatibility and readiness.

parameters.name: otherAnimal
parameters.description: The other animal entity to check for breeding compatibility.
